channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water covering 1/2 west bound carriageway, 3rd November
item.description:
For past 2-3 months the water has been running down the road from Pardon Hill Farm entrance to this spot by the field gateway and flooding out to cover 1/2 the carriage way. However when it rains the flooding expands to the centre line of the carriage way and across the road to form a puddle of 1/2 the east bound carriage way as well. This is happening between a blind bend (by the junction) and a blind brow. It has been bad enough through the mild weather, but once it starts to freeze I believe there is likely to be a serious risk to road users. Regular route users seem to be slowing down as they know about it, but I have had a few near misses with oncoming traffic coming round the blind bend or over the brow. Can we at least get some road flooded and maybe some slippery warning signs out there please? Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Large pothole under water, 3rd November
item.description:
Large pothole on carriage way heading towards Gotherington, near flood by field gateway. Difficult to see as road is still flooded after several weeks. Both myself and wife have hit it when forced into water by fast on coming traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged fence along watercourse, 3rd November
item.description:
The wooden fence on both sides of Millbridge Road on Porchester Road is badly deteriorated and likely to break if anyone leans on it. Plase replace it with something more likely to last longer than wood, or ensure the wood is regularly treated to prevent it rotting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porchester Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Morrisons Shopping trolley, 3rd November
item.description:

item.title: When entering the chicane travelling towards Cleeve visibility is blocked by a small growth of vegetation. This means drivers can enter the chicane and then be faced by an oncoming car travelling towards Gotherington. This is dangerous., 3rd November
item.description:
The vegetation hindering visibility is halfway along the chicane, on the western side of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gotherington Lane, Gotherington, Cheltenham
